title: Extended Mental Models Library
description: Expand the model tool with 7 additional proven mental models: SWOT Analysis, Six Thinking Hats, MECE, Inversion Thinking, Second-Order Effects, Pre-Mortem Analysis, and 5 Whys root cause analysis.

phases.name: Core Tool Schema Updates
phases.description: Update the MODEL_TOOL schema in src/index.ts to add the 7 new mental model names to the enum

subtasks.title: Add new model names to MODEL_TOOL enum
subtasks.description: Add 7 new mental model names to the modelName enum in src/index.ts: swot_analysis, six_thinking_hats, mece, inversion_thinking, second_order_effects, pre_mortem, five_whys
acceptance_criteria: MODEL_TOOL enum includes all 7 new model names
Description updated to list new models

subtasks.title: Update MODEL_TOOL description
subtasks.description: Update the MODEL_TOOL description to include all 7 new mental models in the supported list
acceptance_criteria: Description lists all 13 mental models (6 existing + 7 new)

phases.name: Resource Catalog Updates
phases.description: Add the 7 new mental models to the resource catalog in web/lib/resources/models.ts

subtasks.title: Add SWOT Analysis to catalog
subtasks.description: Add SWOT Analysis mental model with name, title, description, useCases, and steps to MENTAL_MODELS array
acceptance_criteria: SWOT model defined with proper structure

subtasks.title: Add Six Thinking Hats to catalog
subtasks.description: Add Six Thinking Hats (De Bono) mental model with all hat colors explained
acceptance_criteria: Six Hats model defined with proper structure

subtasks.title: Add MECE to catalog
subtasks.description: Add MECE (Mutually Exclusive Collectively Exhaustive) mental model for comprehensive analysis
acceptance_criteria: MECE model defined with proper structure
Clear explanation of ME and CE concepts

subtasks.title: Add Inversion Thinking to catalog
subtasks.description: Add Inversion Thinking mental model for reverse problem-solving
acceptance_criteria: Inversion model defined with proper structure

subtasks.title: Add Second-Order Effects to catalog
subtasks.description: Add Second-Order Effects mental model for consequence chain analysis
acceptance_criteria: Second-Order model defined with proper structure

subtasks.title: Add Pre-Mortem Analysis to catalog
subtasks.description: Add Pre-Mortem Analysis mental model for prospective failure analysis
acceptance_criteria: Pre-Mortem model defined with proper structure

subtasks.title: Add Five Whys to catalog
subtasks.description: Add Five Whys mental model for root cause analysis
acceptance_criteria: Five Whys model defined with proper structure
Includes debugging and quality use cases

phases.name: Extended Model Documentation
phases.description: Add detailed extended documentation for each new model with examples and when-to-use guidance

subtasks.title: Add SWOT Analysis extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add SWOT to EXTENDED_MODELS with whenToUse, detailed steps, example with context and application, relatedModels, and toolParameters

subtasks.title: Add Six Thinking Hats extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add Six Thinking Hats to EXTENDED_MODELS with detailed hat-by-hat explanation and group problem-solving example

subtasks.title: Add MECE extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add MECE to EXTENDED_MODELS with consulting-style example and clear ME/CE explanation
acceptance_criteria: ME and CE concepts clearly explained

subtasks.title: Add Inversion Thinking extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add Inversion Thinking to EXTENDED_MODELS with Charlie Munger-style example

subtasks.title: Add Second-Order Effects extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add Second-Order Effects to EXTENDED_MODELS with systems thinking example
acceptance_criteria: First, second, third order effects explained

subtasks.title: Add Pre-Mortem extended documentation
subtasks.description: Add Pre-Mortem to EXTENDED_MODELS with project planning example

subtasks.title: Add Five Whys extended documentation

phases.name: Unit Tests
phases.description: Add comprehensive unit tests for all 7 new mental models

subtasks.title: Add unit tests for all new models
subtasks.description: Add test cases in modelServer.test.ts to verify all 7 new models can be processed successfully with example scenarios
acceptance_criteria: Test for each new model with valid input

subtasks.description: Update the 'should process all mental model types' test to include all 13 models

phases.name: Verification and Integration
phases.description: Verify backward compatibility and run full test suite

subtasks.title: Run full test suite
subtasks.description: Run npm test to verify all existing tests still pass and new tests pass

subtasks.title: Build verification
subtasks.description: Run npm run build to ensure the project compiles successfully

notes: This spec extends the existing MODEL_TOOL by adding 7 new mental model types. The existing modelServer.ts doesn't need modification since it handles modelName generically - it just validates and formats the data. The main work is adding the new enum values and comprehensive documentation.
